mapper.select: select id,job_level_channel_code AS code,job_level_channel_name AS name from mp_job_level_channel
SELECT count(*) from mp_job_level_channel where (#{id} is null or id != #{id}) and job_level_channel_code = #{jobLevelChannelCode}
SELECT count(*) from mp_Job_Level_channel where (#{id} is null or id != #{id}) and job_level_channel_name = #{jobLevelChannelName}
